PAT_1FE660EB.timeline_summary: Rishi, a 19-year-old patient, was diagnosed with lower back pain and some damage in the spine (L1, L3) around March 15, 2023. He was prescribed Pentop DSR 100mg, Vitamin E 200mg, and Calcium (Shelcal) 500mg. The frequency and duration of these medications are currently unknown.

Medications prescribed include DSR-Pentop, Vitamin E, Calcium (Shelcal), and Lipikind-10 as of March 15, 2023, however, dosage frequencies and durations are missing from the provided records.

PAT_7908B66F.timeline_summary: Rishi, a 19-year-old patient, was diagnosed with diabetes and hypertension in November 2023, indicated by a high blood glucose level of 400+ and blood pressure of 125 mmHg. He was prescribed Tripride-2-forte and Lipikind-10. Further information on frequency and duration of medications is required for optimal monitoring.
